CreateCapacityProvider.name: CreateCapacityProvider
CreateCapacityProvider.description:
Grants permission to create a new capacity provider. Capacity providers are associated
                                                with an Amazon ECS cluster and are used in capacity provider strategies to facilitate
                                                cluster auto scaling

CreateCluster.name: CreateCluster
CreateCluster.description: Grants permission to create a new Amazon ECS cluster

CreateService.name: CreateService
CreateService.description:
Grants permission to run and maintain a desired number of tasks from a specified task
                                                definition via service creation

CreateTaskSet.name: CreateTaskSet
CreateTaskSet.description: Grants permission to create a new Amazon ECS task set

DeleteAccountSetting.name: DeleteAccountSetting
DeleteAccountSetting.description:
Grants permission to modify the ARN and resource ID format of a resource for a specified
                                                IAM user, IAM role, or the root user for an account. You can specify whether the new
                                                ARN and resource ID format are disabled for new resources that are created

DeleteAttributes.name: DeleteAttributes
DeleteAttributes.description: Grants permission to delete one or more custom attributes from an Amazon ECS resource

DeleteCapacityProvider.name: DeleteCapacityProvider
DeleteCapacityProvider.description: Grants permission to delete the specified capacity provider

DeleteCluster.name: DeleteCluster
DeleteCluster.description: Grants permission to delete the specified cluster

DeleteService.name: DeleteService
DeleteService.description: Grants permission to delete a specified service within a cluster

DeleteTaskSet.name: DeleteTaskSet
DeleteTaskSet.description: Grants permission to delete the specified task set

DeregisterContainerInstance.name: DeregisterContainerInstance
DeregisterContainerInstance.description:
Grants permission to deregister an Amazon ECS container instance from the specified
                                                cluster

DeregisterTaskDefinition.name: DeregisterTaskDefinition
DeregisterTaskDefinition.description: Grants permission to deregister the specified task definition by family and revision

DescribeCapacityProviders.name: DescribeCapacityProviders
DescribeCapacityProviders.description: Grants permission to describe one or more Amazon ECS capacity providers

DescribeClusters.name: DescribeClusters
DescribeClusters.description: Grants permission to describes one or more of your clusters

DescribeContainerInstances.name: DescribeContainerInstances
DescribeContainerInstances.description: Grants permission to describes Amazon ECS container instances

DescribeServices.name: DescribeServices
DescribeServices.description: Grants permission to describe the specified services running in your cluster

DescribeTaskDefinition.name: DescribeTaskDefinition
DescribeTaskDefinition.description:
Grants permission to describe a task definition. You can specify a family and revision
                                                to find information about a specific task definition, or you can simply specify the
                                                family to find the latest ACTIVE revision in that family

DescribeTaskSets.name: DescribeTaskSets
DescribeTaskSets.description: Grants permission to describe Amazon ECS task sets

DescribeTasks.name: DescribeTasks
DescribeTasks.description: Grants permission to describe a specified task or tasks

DiscoverPollEndpoint.name: DiscoverPollEndpoint
DiscoverPollEndpoint.description: Grants permission to get an endpoint for the Amazon ECS agent to poll for updates

ExecuteCommand.name: ExecuteCommand
ExecuteCommand.description: Grants permission to run a command remotely on an Amazon ECS container

ListAccountSettings.name: ListAccountSettings
ListAccountSettings.description:
Grants permission to list the account settings for an Amazon ECS resource for a specified
                                                principal

ListAttributes.name: ListAttributes
ListAttributes.description:
Grants permission to lists the attributes for Amazon ECS resources within a specified
                                                target type and cluster

ListClusters.name: ListClusters
ListClusters.description: Grants permission to get a list of existing clusters

ListContainerInstances.name: ListContainerInstances
ListContainerInstances.description: Grants permission to get a list of container instances in a specified cluster

ListServices.name: ListServices
ListServices.description: Grants permission to get a list of services that are running in a specified cluster

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to get a list of tags for the specified resource

ListTaskDefinitionFamilies.name: ListTaskDefinitionFamilies
ListTaskDefinitionFamilies.description:
Grants permission to get a list of task definition families that are registered to
                                                your account (which may include task definition families that no longer have any ACTIVE
                                                task definitions)

ListTaskDefinitions.name: ListTaskDefinitions
ListTaskDefinitions.description: Grants permission to get a list of task definitions that are registered to your account

ListTasks.name: ListTasks
ListTasks.description: Grants permission to get a list of tasks for a specified cluster

Poll.name: Poll
Poll.description:
Grants permission to an agent to connect with the Amazon ECS service to report status
                                                and get commands

PutAccountSetting.name: PutAccountSetting
PutAccountSetting.description:
Grants permission to modify the ARN and resource ID format of a resource for a specified
                                                IAM user, IAM role, or the root user for an account. You can specify whether the new
                                                ARN and resource ID format are enabled for new resources that are created. Enabling
                                                this setting is required to use new Amazon ECS features such as resource tagging

PutAccountSettingDefault.name: PutAccountSettingDefault
PutAccountSettingDefault.description:
Grants permission to modify the ARN and resource ID format of a resource type for
                                                all IAM users on an account for which no individual account setting has been set.
                                                Enabling this setting is required to use new Amazon ECS features such as resource
                                                tagging

PutAttributes.name: PutAttributes
PutAttributes.description: Grants permission to create or update an attribute on an Amazon ECS resource

PutClusterCapacityProviders.name: PutClusterCapacityProviders
PutClusterCapacityProviders.description:
Grants permission to modify the available capacity providers and the default capacity
                                                provider strategy for a cluster

RegisterContainerInstance.name: RegisterContainerInstance
RegisterContainerInstance.description: Grants permission to register an EC2 instance into the specified cluster

RegisterTaskDefinition.name: RegisterTaskDefinition
RegisterTaskDefinition.description: Grants permission to register a new task definition from the supplied family and containerDefinitions

RunTask.name: RunTask
RunTask.description:
Grants permission to start a task using random placement and the default Amazon ECS
                                                scheduler

StartTask.name: StartTask
StartTask.description:
Grants permission to start a new task from the specified task definition on the specified
                                                container instance or instances

StartTelemetrySession.name: StartTelemetrySession
StartTelemetrySession.description: Grants permission to start a telemetry session

StopTask.name: StopTask
StopTask.description: Grants permission to stop a running task

SubmitAttachmentStateChanges.name: SubmitAttachmentStateChanges
SubmitAttachmentStateChanges.description: Grants permission to send an acknowledgement that attachments changed states

SubmitContainerStateChange.name: SubmitContainerStateChange
SubmitContainerStateChange.description: Grants permission to send an acknowledgement that a container changed states

SubmitTaskStateChange.name: SubmitTaskStateChange
SubmitTaskStateChange.description: Grants permission to send an acknowledgement that a task changed states

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag the specified resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag the specified resource

UpdateCapacityProvider.name: UpdateCapacityProvider
UpdateCapacityProvider.description: Grants permission to update the specified capacity provider

UpdateCluster.name: UpdateCluster
UpdateCluster.description: Grants permission to modify the configuration or settings to use for a cluster

UpdateClusterSettings.name: UpdateClusterSettings
UpdateClusterSettings.description: Grants permission to modify the settings to use for a cluster

UpdateContainerAgent.name: UpdateContainerAgent
UpdateContainerAgent.description:
Grants permission to update the Amazon ECS container agent on a specified container
                                                instance

UpdateContainerInstancesState.name: UpdateContainerInstancesState
UpdateContainerInstancesState.description: Grants permission to the user to modify the status of an Amazon ECS container instance

UpdateService.name: UpdateService
UpdateService.description: Grants permission to modify the parameters of a service

UpdateServicePrimaryTaskSet.name: UpdateServicePrimaryTaskSet
UpdateServicePrimaryTaskSet.description: Grants permission to modify the primary task set used in a service

UpdateTaskSet.name: UpdateTaskSet
UpdateTaskSet.description: Grants permission to update the specified task set
